channel.title: TikTok on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in TikTok on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Internet Agrees: Coldplay Concert Scandal Was the Funniest Thing to Happen This Week
item.description: Clips from shows like ‘Succession,’ ‘The Sopranos,’ ‘The Simpsons’ and ‘Knight of Cups’ are being deployed to poke fun at the viral moment from the band’s Boston show.

item.title: The Internet Agrees: Coldplay Concert Scandal Was the Funniest Thing to Happen This Week
item.description: Clips from shows like ‘Succession,’ ‘The Sopranos,’ ‘The Simpsons’ and ‘Knight of Cups’ are being deployed to poke fun at the viral moment from the band’s Boston show.

item.title: TikTok is putting the spotlight on songwriters
item.description: TikTok will now let songwriters highlight tracks they’ve written or co-written directly on their profiles. The list of songs will live within the “Music” tab on their profile, similar to the one TikTo

item.title: Tobi Olujinmi’s Hill 5.14 Media Options ‘New Haven’ Novels for TV Adaptation (Exclusive)
item.description: Olujinmi’s Black female-led label will adapt J.L. Seegars’ BookTok romance hits as their first collaboration with Sony Pictures Television and Eleventh Hour Films.
